class.name: ImageObj
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around a div with an image

constructor.param: style data to pass to the image

event.name: onClick
event.description: Fires when the image is clicked on

event.name: onMouseOver
event.description: Fires when the mouse enters the image's bounding box

event.name: onMouseOut
event.description: Fires when the mouse leaves the image's bounding box

method.name: swapImage
method.return: imageFile The image file to load
